EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.Energy.Utility.L.E.E.15818.EUW 2017 Eblast.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation: Be our guest at EUW 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia has been named the leader in Low Power Wide Area (LPWA) networking for utilities by Navigant Research <[[https://www.navigantresearch.com/research/navigant-research-leaderboard-power-utility-low-power-wide-area-networking-vendors]]>. Nokia was chosen over 14 other equipment vendors and service providers, and is favorably positioned for the evolution of the power grid with IoT.
European Utility Week (EUW) 3-5 October, 2017 RAI, Amsterdam, Netherlands
Learn more about the Nokia NB-IoT solution by attending our seminar Register for a private LTE network and cyber security seminar on Tuesday, 3 October, 17.30 – 19.00, where we will cover two topics:
- Private LTE networks: Find out about the private LTE network solution a utility builds and owns, initial use cases that US utilities identified for their deployments, planning activities, and a tool to quantify its financial impact. - Cyber security solutions for critical networks: Learn how you can effectively account for elements of logical security that meet and exceed current compliance requirements, within a multi-vendor IT and OT environment.
Seminar will be held at the RAI, Amsterdam, Netherlands. Join your peers at a reception after this seminar which is solely for utility personnel. Please RSVP to Mari Holmstrom <[[mailto:mari.holmstrom@nokia.com]]> by 22 September.
For complete event information on EUW 2017, please visit: http://www.european-utility-week.com/ <[[http://www.european-utility-week.com/]]> Learn more about Nokia’s Solutions for Utilities <[[https://networks.nokia.com/power-utilities]]>.
Join us at European Utility Week at Nokia booth 1L22, 3-5 October in Amsterdam. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
